# Join Our Open Meetings

We host regular open meetings to share our progress and gather feedback from anyone who is interested in this work. If you would like to be added to our invitation list for those meetings, please submit your information [here](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScm5WRhVNnmGKeolQddz6V4zreBbN7PwLvVslTdPHBPVWKK4A/viewform?usp=sf_link).

# Request A Briefing

To learn more about our project, or request a briefing for your research group you can email Theresa Burnham: theresa.burnham\@maine.edu
